solution_line_template: On Tuesday she sells {monday_sales} crates * {tuesday_multiplier} = <<{monday_sales}*{tuesday_multiplier}={tuesday_sales}>>{tuesday_sales} crates of eggs.
On Wednesday she sells {tuesday_sales} crates - {wednesday_fewer} crates = <<{tuesday_sales}-{wednesday_fewer}={wednesday_sales}>>{wednesday_sales} crates of eggs.
On Thursday she sells {thursday_fraction} * {tuesday_sales} crates = <<{thursday_fraction}*{tuesday_sales}={thursday_sales}>>{thursday_sales} crates of eggs.

She sells a total of {monday_sales} crates + {tuesday_sales} crates + {wednesday_sales} crates + {thursday_sales} crates = <<{monday_sales}+{tuesday_sales}+{wednesday_sales}+{thursday_sales}={total_sales}>>{total_sales} crates of eggs.
